finalizeDepositERC20(address,address,add.details: Make this function payable to handle WETH deposit/withdraw.      The function should only be called by L2ScrollMessenger.      The function should also only be called by L1ERC20Gateway in L1.

params.amount: The amount of the token to deposit.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.from: The address of account who deposits the token in L1.
params.l1Token: The address of corresponding L1 token.
params.l2Token: The address of corresponding L2 token.
params.to: The address of recipient in L2 to receive the token.

finalizeDepositETH(address,address,uint2.details: This function should only be called by L2ScrollMessenger.      This function should also only be called by L1GatewayRouter in L1.

params._amount: The amount of ETH to deposit.
params._data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params._from: The address of account who deposit ETH in L1.
params._to: The address of recipient in L2 to receive ETH.

params._token: The address of token to query.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDefaultERC20Gateway(address).details: This function should only be called by contract owner.

setERC20Gateway(address[],address[]).details: This function should only be called by contract owner.

params._gateways: The list of addresses of gateways to update.
params._tokens: The list of addresses of tokens to update.

setETHGateway(address).details: This function should only be called by contract owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawERC20(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L1.
params.token: The address of token in L2.

withdrawERC20(address,uint256,uint256).details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.token: The address of token in L2.

withdrawERC20AndCall(address,address,uin.details: Make this function payable to send relayer fee in Ether.

params.amount: The amount of token to transfer.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L1.
params.token: The address of token in L2.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be withdrawn.
params.gasLimit: Optional, gas limit used to complete the withdraw on L1.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L1.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be withdrawn.
params.gasLimit: Optional, gas limit used to complete the withdraw on L1.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be withdrawn.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.gasLimit: Optional, gas limit used to complete the withdraw on L1.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L1.

ERC20Gateway(address).notice: Mapping from L2 ERC20 token address to corresponding L2ERC20Gateway.

defaultERC20Gateway().notice: The addess of default L2 ERC20 gateway, normally the L2StandardERC20Gateway contract.

finalizeDepositERC20(address,address,add.notice: Complete a deposit from L1 to L2 and send fund to recipient's account in L2.

finalizeDepositETH(address,address,uint2.notice: Complete ETH deposit from L1 to L2 and send fund to recipient's account in L2.

getERC20Gateway(address).notice: Return the corresponding gateway address for given token address.

getL1ERC20Address(address).notice: Return the corresponding l1 token address given l2 token address.

getL2ERC20Address(address).notice: Return the corresponding l2 token address given l1 token address.

setDefaultERC20Gateway(address).notice: Update the address of default ERC20 gateway contract.

setERC20Gateway(address[],address[]).notice: Update the mapping from token address to gateway address.

setETHGateway(address).notice: Update the address of ETH gateway contract.

withdrawERC20(address,address,uint256,ui.notice: Withdraw of some token to a recipient's account on L1.

withdrawERC20(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw of some token to a caller's account on L1.

withdrawERC20AndCall(address,address,uin.notice: Withdraw of some token to a recipient's account on L1 and call.

withdrawETH(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw ETH to caller's account in L1.

withdrawETH(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw ETH to caller's account in L1.

withdrawETHAndCall(address,uint256,bytes.notice: Withdraw ETH to caller's account in L1.

documentation.text: @notice The addess of default L2 ERC20 gateway, normally the L2StandardERC20Gateway contract.
@notice Mapping from L2 ERC20 token address to corresponding L2ERC20Gateway.

@notice Return the corresponding gateway address for given token address.
 @param _token The address of token to query.
